description: Adam shows up I'm sure thinking he's just going to get his dick sucked by some dude.  But once he lays his eyes on the gorgeous scene partner that Mike has chosen for him, he becomes more than willing to take a dick down his throat, too.  Funny how much more willing one can be when he likes his chosen scene partner.  Take a wild oral ride with Adam and Tim as  Adam learns that sucking dick can be just as much fun (maybe more) than getting yours sucked.
title: Adam & Tim, Scene #01
